Articles.Content:
I'd love just one stock moving or folding part you could attach things to, even if it had a load limit. 

I could make so many more cool things if I could have something lower, raise, pop out from the side or whatever.

Yes, there's some great mods out there to do this but I just like the simplicity and challenge of building cool stuff from stock parts.

Mechanical parts are one of the many items on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]; as such, I'll have to close this.

Also, this is in entirely the wrong section, so {Moved::Suggestions}. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

However, should you wish to discuss this kind of idea, [this thread here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108890-With-Fairings-becoming-stock-we-NEED-stock-hinges) may interest you.
